description:
<http://sramana.in/indianrail-db/>

Data crawled from <http://indianrail.gov.in>, <http://trainenquiry.com>, <http://indiarailinfo.com>
HTML theme from freehtml5templates.com
Banner photo by Steve Mccurry
My work is dedicated to public domain.
Disclaimer : I don't know about the legality of web scraping. It is your responsibility to sort it out before using the database.
title: Indian Railways Database
name: indian-railways-database
